X-ray
X-ray

Cap Oxide Layer
Cap Oxide Layer

Status of CC Process •Initial Development at U. Arizona (M. Lesser) •Low temp process (130C) •Relies on stable, buried layer of O- ions for backside repulsive field •Appears to be stable long term (>3 years) •Advanced Development at MIT Lincoln Lab in progress •Four lots fabbed thus far; high yields; excellent UV performance •Reference: Burke et al 2003 IEEE Nuc Sci (in press)
